duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop testing strategy and plans with client, cross-service teams, and third-party partners.
Deep understanding and extensive experience with Avaya architecture, design, implementation, and testing.
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the field.
Guide and mentor less experienced personnel.
Communicate with customers, support personnel, and management.
Work in a team environment and handle stressful situations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent years of experience. Professional certification/s required.
